Clawfect:VintageClaw.NAME: Vintage Claw
Clawfect:VintageClaw.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Increase the damage of ALL Claw cards by !M! this combat.

Clawfect:ClawAndTear.NAME: Claw and Tear
Clawfect:ClawAndTear.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to a random enemy 2 times. NL Increase the damage of ALL Claw cards by !M! this combat.

Clawfect:ClawCell.NAME: Claw Cell
Clawfect:ClawCell.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage and apply !M! Vulnerable.  NL Increase the damage of ALL Claw cards by !M! this combat.

Clawfect:ClawpileDriver.NAME: Clawpile Driver
Clawfect:ClawpileDriver.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. Draw 1 card for each unique Orb you have. NL Increase the damage of ALL Claw cards by !M! this combat.

Clawfect:ClawForTheEyes.NAME: Claw for the Eyes
Clawfect:ClawForTheEyes.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If the enemy intends to attack, apply !M! Weak. NL Increase the damage of ALL Claw cards by !M! this combat.

Clawfect:ClawingBeam.NAME: Clawing Beam
Clawfect:ClawingBeam.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. NL Draw 1 card.  NL Increase the damage of ALL Claw cards by !M! this combat.

Clawfect:ClawAndGloom.NAME: Claw and Gloom
Clawfect:ClawAndGloom.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. NL Channel 1 Dark. NL Increase the damage of ALL Claw cards by !M! this combat.

Clawfect:ClawForOne.NAME: Claw for One
Clawfect:ClawForOne.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Put all Cost 0 cards from your discard pile into your hand. NL Increase the damage of ALL Claw cards by !M! this combat.

Clawfect:ClawLightning.NAME: Claw Lightning
Clawfect:ClawLightning.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Channel 1 Lightning. NL Increase the damage of ALL Claw cards by !M! this combat.

Clawfect:Clawline.NAME: Clawline
Clawfect:Clawline.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Whenever you play this card, reduce its cost by 1 for this combat. NL Increase the damage of ALL Claw cards by !M! this combat.

Clawfect:Clawrage.NAME: Clawrage
Clawfect:Clawrage.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage for each Channeled Orb. NL Increase the damage of ALL Claw cards by !M! this combat.

Clawfect:Clawseye.NAME: Clawseye
Clawfect:Clawseye.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Apply 1(2) Lock-On. NL Increase the damage of ALL Claw cards by !M! this combat.

Clawfect:ClawSnap.NAME: Claw Snap
Clawfect:ClawSnap.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Channel 1 Frost. NL Increase the damage of ALL Claw cards by !M! this combat.

Clawfect:Clawter.NAME: Clawter
Clawfect:Clawter.DESCRIPTION: Remove all Block from an enemy. NL Deal !D! damage. NL Increase the damage of ALL Claw cards by !M! this combat.

Clawfect:Clawzard.NAME: Clawzard
Clawfect:Clawzard.DESCRIPTION: Deal damage equal to !D! times the Frost Channeled this combat to ALL enemies. NL Increase the damage of ALL Claw cards by !M! this combat.

Clawfect:FTC.NAME: FTC
Clawfect:FTC.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If you have played less than 3(4) cards this turn, draw 1 card. NL Increase the damage of ALL Claw cards by !M! this combat.

Clawfect:ScrapingClaw.NAME: Scraping Claw
Clawfect:ScrapingClaw.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. Draw !M! cards. Discard all cards drawn this way that do not cost 0. NL Increase the damage of ALL Claw cards by !M! this combat.
